description: The AP-02 Regional Transport Office serves the Anantapuramu district in Andhra Pradesh. Although the state transitioned to a unified AP-39 registration series in 2019, this office continues to manage legacy registrations and regional transport services for the Anantapur area.
address: Regional Transport Office, Bhairava Nagar, Near JNTU Engineering College, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh

description: The AP-03 RTO serves the Chittoor district in Andhra Pradesh, managing vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permits for the region. While the state transitioned to a unified AP-39 registration series for new vehicles in 2019, AP-03 remains the active legacy code and administrative identifier for the Chittoor RTO office.
address: No. 1 & 2, Industrial Estate, Puttur Road, Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh

description: AP-04 is the Regional Transport Office for the YSR Kadapa district in Andhra Pradesh. Although the state shifted to a unified AP-39 code for all new registrations in 2019, this office remains the primary administrative hub for legacy vehicle records and licensing services in the Kadapa region.
address: Uttukur, Chintha Komma Dinne Mandal, Kadapa, Andhra Pradesh

description: AP-05 is the Regional Transport Office for Kakinada, serving as a key administrative hub for vehicle registration and licensing in the East Godavari district. Although Andhra Pradesh introduced a uniform registration series (AP-39) in 2019, AP-05 remains active as a legacy code for identifying vehicles originally registered in the Kakinada jurisdiction.
address: RTO Office Kakinada, Kakinada Rd, Kachiripeta, Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh
